activityParentId.description: The ID of the top level ('parent') activity.

activityParentName.description: The name of the top level ('parent') activity.

calories.description: Number of calories burned during the exercise.

description.description: The description of the recorded exercise.

distance.description: Distance traveled during the on-device recorded exercise.

duration.description: The activeDuration (milliseconds) + any pauses that occurred during the activity recording.

hasActiveZoneMinutes.description: Indicates if the activity has active zone minutes.

hasStartTime.description: Indicates if the activity has a start time.

isFavorite.description: Indicates if the activity is a favorite.

lastModified.description: Timestamp the exercise was last modified.

logId.description: The activity log identifier for the exercise.

startDate.description: The start date of the recorded exercise.

startTime.description: The start time of the recorded exercise.

steps.description: Number of steps recorded during the exercise.
